column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aiwei says : " That wo n't be necessary . "
#Text=Lin says : " Maybe it was n't a guard after all .
#Text=Your sister was not involved !
#Text=" Suyin says : " No , I 'll gladly be questioned .
#Text=I have nothing to hide .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " What is your full name ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Suyin Beifong .
#Text=I 'm the daughter of Toph and the only sister to Lin , and I had nothing to do with the attack last night .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " She is telling the truth .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is a waste of time !
#Text=Just bring in the next guard !
#Text=" Aiwei says : " Give me your name and tell me where you are from .
#Text=" Hong Li says : " I 'm Hong Li .
#Text=I was born and raised here in Zaofu .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " Do you have any knowledge of the people who tried to kidnap the Avatar ?
#Text=" Hong Li says : " No .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " Did you help the attackers enter Zaofu last night ?
#Text=" Hong Li says : " No , of course not .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " You 're lying .
#Text=" Hong Li says : " What ?!
#Text=No , I 'm not !
#Text=" Suyin says : " How did they get in and out ?
#Text=Where are they now ?
#Text=" Hong Li says : " I do n't know !
#Text=I 'm telling you , I did n't help them !
#Text=" Suyin says : " You 're a traitor to the entire clan !
#Text=" Aiwei says : " I suggest we search his place .
#Text=" Mako says : " I got something !
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=" Mako says : " It looks like it 's from them .
#Text=" Team assembled .
#Text=Aiwei says : " These are the guards ' logbooks .
#Text=We have to get him to talk .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let 's go confront him with this evidence right now .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " No .
#Text=Let 's give him a little time to sweat it out .
#Text=He will talk eventually .
#Text="
